short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read linked slack conversations by hovering over the link in your page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every time I encounter a link to a slack message on another platform like github issues or jira or confluence, I get frustrated because I have to switch platforms with high latency to actually read that message. 
So I built this extension to make that easier and bring the slack messages to the platform it's being viewed on. If you have installed this extension and logged into slack, you can now read the slack message when you hover over the link. This is frictionless and awesome experience.
